summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5429 for the improvement of 40th Avenue Southwest, from West Brandon Street to West Alaska Street; except the east side of said avenue, from West Dawson Street to West Alaska Street; by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same under Ordinance No. 67932 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
